text: The University of Silesia in Katowice () is an autonomous state-run university in Katowice, Silesia Province, Poland.History on University of Silesia. The university offers higher education and research facilities. It offers undergraduate, masters, and PhD degree programs, as well as postgraduate, postdoctoral research, habilitation, and continuous education and training programs. ==References== Sil Category:Katowice
title: University of Silesia in Katowice
